descr: An emulation environment with a set of nodes that run common networked services such as SSH, FTP, Telnet, IRC, Kafka, etc. Some of the services are vulnerable to simple dictionary attacks as they use weak passwords.The task of an attacker agent is to identify the vulnerabilities and exploit them and discover hidden flagson the nodes. Conversely, the task of the defender is to harden the defense of the nodes and to detect theattacker.
name: csle-level4-010

commands: (sleep 2; echo test; sleep 2; echo test; sleep 3;) | telnet {} > /dev/null 2>&1
